exitModal.title: Do you want to leave the questionnaire?
exitModal.content: If you leave the questionnaire, your responses will be saved. You can return to the questionnaire at any time to complete or finalize it.

toast.toastSaveSuccessDescription: Your changes have been recorded and saved.
toast.toastSaveErrorDescription: An error occurred while saving your changes.
toast.toastSaveNetworkErrorDescription: A network error occurred, and the data was not saved. Do not close this window so that it can be transmitted upon reconnection.

visualize.title: Survey preview.
visualize.sourceFileError: You must provide at least one source file URI

selectNomenclature.title: Suggestion references.
selectNomenclature.description: Add new suggestion references. To be used, they must also appear in the suggesters section of the source file.
